Monopoly

Class MonopolyGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • Monopoly.MonopolyGame

  • public class MonopolyGame
extends java.lang.Object
    The MonopolyGame class is responsible for handling all functions of an instance of a Monopoly game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Tile[] board
      An array of tiles representing the 40 tiles on a monopoly game board
      private int currentPlayer
      A pointer to an element in MonopolyGame.players; a symbol for who's turn it is next
      private Player[] players
      An array containing all the players in the current game

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MonopolyGame()
      Initializes a new monopoly game with a new board, and four players.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Player[] getPlayers() 
      void nextPlayer()
      Chance the current player to the next player which is still in the game
      void payRent(Player payer, PropertyTile titleDeed)
      Transfer money from one player to another for rent on a colored property
      void payRent(Player payer, RailroadTile titleDeed)
      Transfer money from one player to another for rent on a Railroad
      void payRent(Player payer, UtilityTile titleDeed, int roll)
      Transfer money from one player to another for rent on a Utility
      void playTurn()
      Calls upon a player to play their turn
      Tile tileAt(int index)
      Get the game tile (Tile) at the specified index

      • payRent

        public void payRent(Player payer,
                    PropertyTile titleDeed)
        Transfer money from one player to another for rent on a colored property
        Parameters:
        payer - The player who is paying rent (will lose money)
        titleDeed - The property on which rent is due

      • payRent

        public void payRent(Player payer,
                    RailroadTile titleDeed)
        Transfer money from one player to another for rent on a Railroad
        Parameters:
        payer - The player who is paying rent (will lose money)
        titleDeed - The Railroad on which rent is due

      • payRent

        public void payRent(Player payer,
                    UtilityTile titleDeed,
                    int roll)
        Transfer money from one player to another for rent on a Utility
        Parameters:
        payer - The player who is paying rent (will lose money)
        titleDeed - The Utility on which rent is due
        roll - The amount rolled in order to have landed on such property

        Calls upon a player to play their turn
